channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: イギリスのコメディアン、ジョー・ライセットが、メール紙、サン紙、BBCニュース、ITVニュース、スカイニュース、インディペンデント紙など、イギリスのメディアに4つのフェイク記事を仕掛けたことを公表（Nadeem Badshah/The Guardian）
item.description:
Nadeem Badshah / The Guardian:
UK comedian Joe Lycett discloses that he planted four fake stories in the UK media, including the Mail, the Sun, BBC News, ITV News, Sky News and Independent  —  Stories include man with bruise in shape of Prince Harry and statue of H from Steps being erected in Wales

item.title: [スレッド】NPRの偏向に関するウリ・ベルリナーのエッセイには、検証可能な虚偽、欠陥のある議論、疑わしい有権者登録データなど、重大な問題がある（Aaron Fritschner/@fritschner）
item.description:
Aaron Fritschner / @fritschner:
[Thread] Uri Berliner's essay on NPR bias has significant problems, including verifiable falsehoods, flawed arguments, and questionable voter registration data  —  Finally read the Uri Berliner piece on NPR biasand I'm baffled by how little the enormous media controversy it spawned has resulted in scrutiny of its claims for factual accuracy. There are significant problems with the piece including obvious, verifiable falsehoods

item.title: 情報筋：元Disney TVチーフ、ベン・シャーウッド氏と元Hearst Magazines幹部ジョアンナ・コールズ氏がデイリービーストの株式49％を購入、バリー・ディラー氏は51％を保持（Dylan Byers/@dylanbyers）
item.description:
Dylan Byers / @dylanbyers:
Sources: former Disney TV chief Ben Sherwood and former Hearst Magazines exec Joanna Coles will buy a 49% stake in The Daily Beast; Barry Diller will retain 51%  —  SCOOP Pt. 2 @PuckNews: Ben Sherwood and Joanna Coles will buy 49% stake of The Daily Beast, I'm told... Barry Diller will retain majority 51% stake... Sherwood & Coles giving interview to @nytimes this weekend ahead of formal announcement

item.title: 米連邦検察当局は、ティム・バークにフォックス・ニュースなどが使用するシステムへのアクセス資格を与えたとされるマルコ・ガウディーノを共謀罪1件で起訴（マシュー・キーズ／デスク）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Federal prosecutors charge Marco Gaudino with one count of conspiracy for allegedly giving Tim Burke credentials to access systems used by Fox News and others  —  A Washington state man has been criminally charged for allegedly conspiring with a Florida journalist to compromise online-based servers …

item.title: Twitchはスペイン語の主要プラットフォームとなり、TheGrefgやIbai Llanosのようなストリーマーがスポーツのライブイベントを主催し、多くの視聴者を集めている（シャーウッドニュース）。
item.description:
Sherwood News:
Twitch has become a major Spanish-language platform, with streamers like TheGrefg and Ibai Llanos hosting live sporting events that attract massive audiences  —  Spanish streamers are redefining Twitch's relationship to traditional media.  —  One of the most interesting stories our data …

item.title: 連邦地裁判事はメディア・マターズを支持し、テキサス州のケン・パクストン州知事を支持、同州知事によるXに関する広告報道の調査を差し止める。
item.description:
Media Matters for America:
A district court judge sides with Media Matters against Texas AG Ken Paxton, blocking Paxton's probe for now into the outlet's reporting on advertising on X  —  Media Matters President and CEO Angelo Carusone issued the following statement after Judge Amit Mehta of the United States District Court …

item.title: SAG-AFTRA、WMGやソニー・ミュージックエンタテインメントなど大手レコード会社と暫定合意、AI使用に関する保護も盛り込む（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
SAG-AFTRA reaches a tentative deal with major record labels, including WMG and Sony Music Entertainment, that includes protections over the use of AI  —  Hollywood performers and media professionals have reached a tentative deal with major record labels such as Warner Music Group (WMG.O) …

item.title: Audacyは、AIを使って合成音声を作成・編集するElevenLabsと提携し、リスナーや広告クライアント向けの音声ライブラリを構築すると発表した（Paul McLane/Radio World）。
item.description:
Paul McLane / Radio World:
Audacy announces it is partnering with ElevenLabs, which uses AI to create and edit synthetic voices, to build a library of voices for listeners and ad clients  —  One of the largest radio groups in the U.S. is escalating its use of synthetic voices.  —  Audacy announced on Friday …

item.title: 米上院選に関する党派的な記事を作成するよう指示された、AIを搭載したローカル「ニュース」サイトの作成事例。Fiverrの開発者が80ドルで作成した（Jack Brewster/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Jack Brewster / Wall Street Journal:
A case study of the creation of an AI-powered local “news” website, directed to produce partisan stories on a US Senate race; a Fiverr developer made it for $80  —  I paid a website developer to create a fully automated, AI-generated ‘pink-slime’ news site, programmed to create false political stories.

item.title: メモNPRのキャサリン・マハーは、NPRがその使命を果たしているかどうかを問うのは公正だが、アイデンティティに基づいてスタッフの誠実さを問うのは無礼だと言う（Katherine Maher/NPR）
item.description:
Katherine Maher / NPR:
Memo: NPR's Katherine Maher says questioning whether NPR is living up to its mission is fair, but questioning staff integrity based on identity is disrespectful  —  The message below was sent by NPR's President and CEO to all staff:  —  Dear all,  —  This has been a long week.

item.title: 金曜日、ガザ中心部でのイスラエル軍の攻撃で、トルコの放送局TRTに勤務するサミ・シェハダ氏が足を失うなど、複数のジャーナリストが負傷した（CNN）。
item.description:
CNN:
Several journalists were injured Friday in an Israeli attack in central Gaza, including Sami Shehada, who lost a leg; he works for Turkish broadcaster TRT  —  Israeli forces surrounded and attacked the Nuseirat refugee camp in central Gaza on Friday, wounding several journalists and at least one other person.

item.title: iHeartMediaがテッド・クルーズ上院議員の再選を目的としたPACに送った63万ドルをめぐり、2つのグループがFECに選挙資金に関する苦情を申し立てた（Matthew Choi/The Texas Tribune）。
item.description:
Matthew Choi / The Texas Tribune:
Two groups have filed a campaign finance complaint with the FEC over $630K that iHeartMedia sent to a PAC dedicated to the reelection of US Sen. Ted Cruz  —  End Citizens United and the Campaign Legal Center asserted Cruz could have broken campaign finance rules.

item.title: TikTokとインスタグラムの動画は、ポッドキャストクリップのように見せかけた広告である。
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
A look at TikTok and Instagram videos that are really ads made to look like podcast clips, as some brands hire actors using podcast staging to convey authority  —  Brands like the validating veneer of the podcast look without having to pay premium prices for actual spots on shows  —  Welcome back to Soundbite.

item.title: PBSで20年以上夕方のニュース番組のキャスターを務め、ジム・レーラーとともに公平で派手さのないニュースを伝えたロバート・マクニールが93歳で死去（Elizabeth Jensen/New York Times）
item.description:
Elizabeth Jensen / New York Times:
Robert MacNeil, who anchored evening newscasts for over two decades on PBS and delivered evenhanded, non-flashy news with Jim Lehrer, dies at 93  —  With his longtime co-host Jim Lehrer, he delivered thoughtful reports that stood in stark contrast to the commercial networks' ever more sensational newscasts.

item.title: アドビは、Midjourneyのようなツールで作成され、ユーザーによってストックマーケットプレイスにアップロードされた画像をFireflyの学習に使用。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Adobe used images created by tools like Midjourney and uploaded to its stock marketplace by users to train Firefly; Adobe says ~5% of images were AI-generated  —  Company promotes its tool as safe from content scraped from the internet.  —  When Adobe Inc. released its Firefly image-generating software …
